list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Optimized image update
- now only update the image of the tiles affected by a move instead of all 64 tiles.

task.summary:
In the App class - main window (JFrame) - chessboard panel and menu panel (JPanel) - chess board filled with Tiles
Tile class - the Tile class (will have more functionality later), is currently just a coloured button with row and column fields
piece images, new game button - added newGame function to button (sets the piece field in each Tile then updates its imageIcon. - added Piece class to hold static int values for each piece type

Added ability move pieces, new game function image update
- fine-tuned image update to show both white and black - added moving functionality (no rules yet) - new game function now works properly

Optimized image update
- now only update the image of the tiles affected by a move instead of all 64 tiles.
